mainboard.name: Wrath of God
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

mainboard.name: Unmake
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target creature.

mainboard.name: Liliana, Death's Majesty
mainboard.oracle_text:
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Mill two cards.
−3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
−7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

mainboard.name: Sanctum Seeker
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Path to Exile
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Ajani Goldmane
mainboard.oracle_text:
+1: You gain 2 life.
−1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
−6: Create a white Avatar creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

mainboard.name: Oathsworn Vampire
mainboard.oracle_text:
Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped.
You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.

mainboard.name: Disfigure
mainboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Kalastria Highborn
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

mainboard.name: Mesmeric Fiend
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

mainboard.name: Paladin of the Bloodstained
mainboard.oracle_text: When Paladin of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

mainboard.name: Pitiless Pontiff
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Pitiless Pontiff gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

mainboard.name: Mavren Fein, Dusk Apostle
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

mainboard.name: Butcher of Malakir
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

mainboard.name: Doom Blade
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

mainboard.name: Journey to Nowhere
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature.
When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainboard.name: Pharika's Spawn
mainboard.oracle_text:
Escape—{5}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Pharika's Spawn escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it enters the battlefield this way, each opponent sacrifices a non-Gorgon creature.

mainboard.name: Oblivion Ring
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainboard.name: Alseid of Life's Bounty
mainboard.oracle_text:
Lifelink
{1}, Sacrifice Alseid of Life's Bounty: Target creature or enchantment you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Vampire's Zeal
mainboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Vampire, it gains first strike until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Terramorphic Expanse
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Harm's Way
mainboard.oracle_text: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to any target instead.

mainboard.name: Shineshadow Snarl
mainboard.oracle_text:
As Shineshadow Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Plains or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Shineshadow Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

mainboard.name: Inspiring Cleric
mainboard.oracle_text: When Inspiring Cleric enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

mainboard.name: Malakir Bloodwitch
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying, protection from white
When Malakir Bloodwitch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

mainboard.name: Field of Ruin
mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

mainboard.name: Vampire Aristocrat
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

sideboard.name: Giant Growth
sideboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

sideboard.name: Avenger of Zendikar
sideboard.oracle_text:
When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

sideboard.name: Hellkite Charger
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Hellkite Charger attacks, you may pay {5}{R}{R}. If you do, untap all attacking creatures and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

sideboard.name: Groundswell
sideboard.oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

sideboard.name: Bonesplitter
sideboard.oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {1}

sideboard.name: Sai of the Shinobi
Vampire's Bite
sideboard.oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

sideboard.name: Blinding Mage
sideboard.oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

sideboard.name: Eidolon of Obstruction
sideboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Loyalty abilities of planeswalkers your opponents control cost {1} more to activate.

sideboard.name: Lion Sash
sideboard.oracle_text:
{W}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a permanent card, put a +1/+1 counter on Lion Sash.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on Lion Sash.
Reconfigure {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

sideboard.name: Darksteel Colossus
sideboard.oracle_text:
Trample, indestructible
If Darksteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Darksteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

sideboard.name: Liliana's Mastery
sideboard.oracle_text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

sideboard.name: Gwyllion Hedge-Mage
sideboard.oracle_text:
When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token.
When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Swamps, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

sideboard.name: Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted
sideboard.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player.
−2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.

sideboard.name: Cartouche of Solidarity
sideboard.oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Solidarity enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

sideboard.name: Kor Duelist
sideboard.oracle_text: As long as Kor Duelist is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

sideboard.name: Beacon of Unrest
sideboard.oracle_text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

sideboard.name: Mire Triton
sideboard.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Mire Triton enters the battlefield, mill two cards and you gain 2 life.

sideboard.name: Inevitable End
sideboard.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."

sideboard.name: Soul Warden
sideboard.oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

sideboard.name: Shinewend
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Shinewend enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Shinewend: Destroy target enchantment.
